title: Embed/deploy the interactive heart-burst page at panda-m9z.caffiene.xyz

requirements.text: Make the interactive heart-burst experience the page content served at panda-m9z.caffiene.xyz (i.e., visiting the domain loads this app at the root URL and the interaction works end-to-end).

quotes:
And can you add this in this page 
panda-m9z.caffiene.xyz

acceptanceCriteria: When navigating to https://panda-m9z.caffiene.xyz/, the user sees the heart-burst page (not a blank screen or missing assets).
The heart interaction (tap/click/keyboard) and post-burst message display work the same way on panda-m9z.caffiene.xyz as in the current build.
All static assets load correctly from the deployed location (no 404s due to incorrect base paths).

constraints: Do not edit files under frontend/src/components/ui or any other immutable paths listed in SYSTEM_CONTEXT.
Keep all backend logic in backend/main.mo (single-actor architecture); do not introduce additional backend services.
nonGoals: Adding new animations or changing the existing heart/message behavior beyond what is required for the page to work on panda-m9z.caffiene.xyz.
Implementing new backend APIs or persistence.
